Pages.Title: A - Adversity
Pages.Body: Stress Reaction Events: Why did this event occur ?

Pages.Title: B - Beliefs
Pages.Body: How the event was perceived according to our current feelings ?

Pages.Title: C - Consequence
Pages.Body: How to react according to these events ?

Pages.Title: How it works ?
Pages.Body: We analyze our reaction, we question our negative thoughts, we relativize and we rethink the positive in order to recover ourselves

Pages.Title: Relativize
Pages.Body: Playing with space - Playing with time

Pages.Title: What is the impact of our concerns on a global scale ?
Pages.Body: Looking at the paper and noticing that what's bothering us isn't on the front page...

Pages.Title: How will you look at your problems 10 years from now ?
Pages.Body: Imagine yourself several years from now thinking about your current problems.

Pages.Title: Give yourself a new dimension to your difficulties
